name: Firefox Lite 2.5.1
body:
The new Firefox Lite now features : 
a. Awesome bar - a faster and more intelligent search experience for you.  
b. Home customization - change themes, pin top sites and more. 
Fast and lightweight, now you can tailor-make your own browser.

body:
What's New:
Improved landscape mode experience - you can now access url and toolbar functions in landscape mode

name: Firefox Lite 2.0.5
body:
What's New:
- The new Firefox Lite new features : 
a. Smart shopping search - easily compare prices across multiple shopping sites at once. 
b. More content - free games, news. (Shopping deals are available in India and Indonesia.)
Fast and lightweight, now loaded with fun!

body:

b. More content - free games, news. (Shopping deals are available in India and Indonesia.)
Fast and lightweight, now loaded with fun!

name: Firefox Lite 2.0.2
body:
What's New
- The Firefox Lite Advanced Edition now features : 
a. Smart Shopping Search - Easily compare prices across multiple shopping sites at once. 
b. More Content - Free games, news. (Shopping deals are available in India and Indonesia.)
- Fast and lightweight, now loaded with fun!

body:
What's New

name: Firefox Lite 1.7.0
body:
What's New
- Tamil, Kannada and Malayalam new locale support
- New feature to add Private Browsing shortcut to Android home screen for quick access

name: Firefox Lite 1.6.2
body:
Whats New
- Landscape mode support 
- Life Feed enhancements

name: Firefox Lite 1.5.1
body:
Whats New
- Display number of trackers blocked in Private Browsing 
- Display file size when downloading files 
- More e-commerce contents in Life Feed for Indonesia

name: Firefox Lite 1.4.0
body:
Whats New
- Introduction of Life Feed feature in Indonesia with e-commerce contents 
- Improvements for reliability

name: Firefox Lite 1.2.1
body:
Whats New
- Introduction of Life Feed feature in India with news content
- Improvements for reliability

name: Firefox Lite 1.3.1
body:
Whats New
- Users can now pin their favorite Top Sites (Indonesia only) 
- Improvements for reliability

name: Firefox Lite 1.1.3
body:
Whats New
- New languages support for Traditional Chinese and Vietnamese
- New feature to One-click Search on social media and e-commerce sites
- Private Browsing download support
- Improvements for reliability

name: Firefox Lite 1.0.11
body:
Whats New
- Improved Download Manager user experience
- Improvements for reliability
Apa yang Baru
- Peningkatan pengalaman pengguna pada Pengelola Unduhan
- Peningkatan keandalan

name: Firefox Lite 1.0.9
body:
Whats New

- Improvements for reliability

- Peningkatan keandalan

name: Release 3.4.1
body:
Whats New
- Easier access to private browsing via the app menu
- Improvements for reliability
